text:
I have lived, worked and volunteered throughout
many countries around the world, but Canada
will always be home to me.

When I travel, I like to bring a piece of
Canada with me.
What represents Canada better than Roots Canada?

If there is ever a time I'm indecisive, it's
right now!

I'm in the Roots Canada store, and I'm going
to choose an outfit or two to take with me
to Curacao.

There is so much to choose from, that I don't
know what to do with myself.
I guess, start looking...

Roots Canada has been promoting a healthy
active lifestyle and respect for the environment
since it's creation in 1973.

Add the fact that their apparel is made with
a variety of the best fabrics, some of which

are made from organic and sustainable fabrics,and
you've got yourself the ideal place to get

a reliable, comfortable and stylish wardrobe
for your globe trotting adventures.

What I really love about Roots clothing is
the quality, it lasts forever.

I have a pair of track pants that I have been
wearing nearly every single day.

I put them on when i come home from work or
just spend the day out in them and the quality

is so good, they last forever and they are
so comfortable to wear.

They are great for travel, especially on long
flights.

What i love about Roots is the fact that they
believe in protecting environment by doing

what they can to minimize their environmental
impact.

From making sustainable products to reducing
waste and packaging to being involved with
many environmental organization.

I had a lot of fun shopping at Roots but I
must say it was very hard to narrow down my

selection because everything was so comfortable
and looked so good.

But I did and I can't wait to bring what I
got to Curacao at the end of the month and
show some Canadian pride.

Since I love you all so much, I'm giving away
a $50 gift card to Roots so you can go on
your won shopping spree.

Just click on the link below and follow the
instructions.
Good luck and happy travels.
